```{r}
# Load dplyr and read CSV
library(dplyr)

emperors <- read.csv("emperors.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

str(emperors)
head(emperors)
summary(emperors)
```
## dplyr Analysis

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

### Q1
```{r}
library(dplyr)
emperors %>% 
  select(name, reign_start, reign_end) %>% 
  arrange(desc(reign_end))
```

### Q2
```{r}
emperors %>% 
  filter(killer == "Assassination")
```


### Q3
```{r}
emperors %>%
  mutate(age = as.numeric(death) - as.numeric(birth)) %>%
  select(name, age)
```

### Q4
```{r}
emperors %>% 
  group_by(killer) %>% 
  summarise(count = n())
```

### Q5
```{r}
emperors %>%
  mutate(
    birth_num = as.numeric(birth),
    death_num = as.numeric(death),
    age = death_num - birth_num
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(age)) %>%
  head(10)
```
